thread.title: Mabel Fitzpatrick
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Mabel Fitzpatrick

author: Mabel Fitzpatrick
title: Mabel Fitzpatrick
text: I had a problem when I tried to place my last order - payment wouldn't go through. Then the boots I wanted to purchase were no longer available in my cart. Customer service was not good, just said 'we're sorry,' but there's nothing we can do. However, the boots I wanted did come back online and this time I was able to complete the order without any problems. The boots arrived quickly and are perfect, I just think the item should have been left in my cart, given that Ecco knew there was a problem with their payment system. Customer service could have been more helpful too.
